name: SF HSH - Housing & Shelter Services
description: Access to San Francisco's homeless services system including shelter, housing, and support
fullDescription: San Francisco's Department of Homelessness and Supportive Housing provides emergency shelters, navigation centers, and permanent supportive housing through a coordinated entry system.
whatTheyOffer:
- Emergency shelters
- Navigation centers (low-barrier shelters)
- Rapid rehousing programs
- Permanent supportive housing
- Street outreach services
- Coordinated entry system
howToGetIt:
1. Call SF 311 (dial 3-1-1) for homeless services
2. Or visit a local access point
3. Complete coordinated entry assessment
4. Connect with case manager
5. Access available housing resources
keywords: HSH, San Francisco, homeless, shelter, navigation center, supportive housing, coordinated entry, SF, housing
